src:
Foto: Pri Zbehoch sa prevrátilo auto s fekáliami, vodič sa vraj zamyslel
06 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Webnoviny
6.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Kuriózna nehoda sa stala pri Zbehoch v okrese Nitra. Prevrátilo sa tu auto s fekáliami. Vodič cisterny sa vraj zamyslel a pravými kolesami sa dostal na nespevnenú krajnicu.
Ako informovala nitrianska krajská polícia, pri pokuse dostať sa z nej prešiel do protismeru a tu sa prevrátil. Pri hrozivo vyzerajúcej nehode sa našťastie nikto nezranil. Alkohol vodičovi nezistili.
Viac k témam: dopravná nehodaZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Foto: Pri Zbehoch sa prevrátilo auto s fekáliami, vodič sa vraj zamyslel © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Photo: At Zbehoch overturned car with faeces, the driver said to think
06 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Webnoviny
6.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - A curious accident happened near Zbehoch in the district of Nitra. A car with the faeces turned over here. The tanker driver thought about it and got his right wheels on the unpaved shoulder.
As reported by the Nitra regional police, when trying to get out of it went into the opposite direction and overturned here. Fortunately, no one was hurt in a terrible-looking accident. Alcohol was not detected to the driver.
More about the topic: car accidentSource: Webnoviny.sk - Photo: The car crashed with feces at the Zbehoch, the driver apparently thought © SITA All rights reserved.
